name: Epic Quest
text: Your victory against the evil barbarians of this tribe has brought to our Empire many rewards!

choices.text: We have recovered stolen cultural artifacts in the encampment!
The battle has taught your soldiers a valuable lesson in warfare!
We have rescued some kidnapped villagers, and they have asked to settle in our Empire out of gratitude!
We have recovered the barbarians' loot stash!
We have recovered stolen tablets detailing technological secrets!
uniques: [1] free random researchable Tech(s) from the [Ancient era]

choices.text: We have recovered advanced weapons from the encampment!
uniques: [This Unit] upgrades for free including special upgrades

choices.text: We have recovered a crudely-drawn map detailing locations of this barbarian clan's subordinate tribes!
uniques: Reveal up to [All] [Barbarian encampment] within a [10] tile radius

choices.text: We have recovered stolen holy symbols from the encampment!
uniques: Gain enough Faith for a Pantheon

choices.text: We have rescued a prophet from the encampment!
uniques: Gain enough Faith for [33]% of a Great Prophet
